body_html: I was also surprised to learn that TensorFlow does not do automatic CPU dispatch. MKL as such is fine but why not support it out of the box? Using an auto-vectorizing compiler like MSVC++ could do this for some algorithms.
body_text: I was also surprised to learn that TensorFlow does not do automatic CPU dispatch. MKL as such is fine but why not support it out of the box? Using an auto-vectorizing compiler like MSVC++ could do this for some algorithms.
body: I was also surprised to learn that TensorFlow does not do automatic CPU dispatch. MKL as such is fine but why not support it out of the box? Using an auto-vectorizing compiler like MSVC++ could do this for some algorithms.
